acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Wallace B. McFarland in 1956.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes 54 miscellaneous letters, 1821-1866; diaries and financial records McFarland kept while he was a missionary and during his two pastorates, 1823-1836, and 1841-1871, at Bethel Presbyterian Church, Augusta County, Va.; lecture notes taken while a student at Princeton University; and printed biographical sketches and engravings of McFarland.Correspondents include Stonewall Jackson, George Junkin, William Spottswood.
